panels.html:
Warranties in relation to the information provided to Lonsec Research Pty Ltd in this Survey

The fund manager warrants that:

  1. It has the authority and right to complete the Survey;
  2. The information provided in the Survey is accurate and complete to the best of the fund manager’s knowledge;
  3. The fund manager has read, understood and accepted the Disclosures provided by Lonsec Research Pty Ltd on this Data Portal.

option.content: I acknowledge that I have read, understood and agree to the warranties.
I acknowledge that I have read, understood and agree to the warranties.
